code:
import { createSelector } from 'reselect'; // #### INPUT SELECTOR - DOES NOT USE CREATE SELECTOR

const selectCart = state => state.cart; // #### OUTPUT SELECTOR - IT WILL USE BOTH INPUT SELECTOR & CREATE SELECTOR | MEMOIZE SELECTOR


export const selectCartItems = createSelector([selectCart], cart => cart.cartItems); // #### CART ITEM COUNT SELECTOR

export const selectCartItemCount = createSelector([selectCartItems], cartItems => cartItems.reduce((accumulatedQuantity, cartItem) => accumulatedQuantity + cartItem.quantity, 0));
